title: Teacher Evaluation Web Application (Laravel)
description: Web app for student feedback on teachers using Laravel, featuring user authentication and dynamic forms for easy scalability.

title: Clothing Store Backend API (Django)
description: Built a Django API for a mobile clothing store with product listings, user authentication, and JWT-based security.

description: Developed a React Native frontend for a clothing store app, focusing on intuitive navigation and shopping cart management.

title: Internal System and Webex API Integration
description: Developed modules for file management at the Tribunal Superior de Justicia, integrating Webex API for secure video conferencing. (PHP)
